RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Defendants: Ramon De La Cruz and Zeba Williams

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that signed proposed orders and considered factors for granting continuances
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant who requested continuances to prepare for trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: co-defendant of Ramon De La Cruz, also requesting continuances
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz and Zeba Williams: defendants whose requests for continuances were granted by the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials, including exclusions for certain periods
